content: (Refiles to remove repeated words "the company" in paragraph 26)     By Valerie Volcovici     WAYNESBURG  Pa.  Nov 1 When Mike Sylvester entered a career training center earlier this year in southwestern Pennsylvania  he found more than one hundred federally funded courses covering everything from computer programming to nursing.     He settled instead on something familiar: a coal mining course.      "I think there is a coal comeback ” said the 33-year-old son of a miner.     Despi
